name: Computer Science
description: Learn programming, algorithms, and software development.
eligibility: High school diploma with math background

name: Engineering
description: Explore mechanical, electrical, and civil engineering.
eligibility: High school diploma with science background

name: Psychology
description: Understand human behavior and mental processes.

name: Fine Arts
description: Develop skills in painting, sculpture, and other visual arts.

name: Medicine
description: Comprehensive study of medical sciences and clinical practice.
eligibility: High school diploma with science background and entrance exam

name: Law
description: Learn about legal systems, laws, and legal practices.

name: Architecture
description: Study design, construction, and urban planning.
eligibility: High school diploma with math and art background
